_header: Saint Philip and Saint Jacob apostles weren tway
Subjects: saints’ lives; Philip and James, saints, lives of
_description: Lives of SS. Philip and James in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Pelip & seynt Iacob apostles tweieþe uerste day
                    þat comeþ in may deþ hi þolede beie…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne seynt Iacob & seynt Pelip
                    alsoþat oure soule mote uorþ wiþ hore in to þe Ioie of
                    heuene be ido
BodAsh43.Note:
Presented as two pieces each beginning with an ornamental
                    capital.

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint phelip & seint iacob apostles wern tweyeÞe ferste
                    day þat comeþ in may deþ hy þoledin beye…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝerne seint phelip & seint iacob
                    alsoÞat oure soules mowe þorw hem In ioye of heuen ben
                    do
Bod779.Attributed Title:
Seint phelip þe postil (f. 122v); Seint iacob þe
                    postil (f. 123)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Phelip and seint Iacob apostles weoren tweyneÞe furste
                    day þat comeþ in Mai deþ heo þoleden
                    beyne…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝeorne seint Phelip and seint Iacob
                    alsoÞat vre soules mote wiþ heoren in heuene ben i do.
                    A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint phelipe and Seint Iacob apostles weren tweiȝeÞe
                    formeste dai þat comeȝ in may deth huy þoleden
                    beiȝe…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Apostel he was and martyr also faste men scholden is eueBote
                    for þe heiȝe Easter feste men moten it nede bi leue
BodLauMis108.Attributed Title:
Apostolorum Philippi et Iacobi (f. 156); Vita sancti Iacobi
                    (f. 156v)
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 364-6.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint philip & sent Iacob Apostles were tweieþe first day
                    þat comeþ in may deþ þei tholede beye…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Bidde we ȝerne seint Iacob & sent philip
                    alsoþat oure soules mot with here into þe Ioye of heuene be
                    do
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Philip & seint Iacob þat apostlis were tweyeþe
                    firste day þat comeþ in may þe deþ þei þoled
                    beye…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Bidde we ȝerne seint iacob and seint philip alsoþat
                    oure soulis myȝten wiþ here in þe ioie of heuyn be do

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seint Phelip & seint Iacob appostles were tweyeþe ferste
                    day þat comeþ in may deþ hy þolede beye…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝerne seint Iacob & seint Phelip al
                    soþat oure soule mote forþ with hare in ioye of heuene be y
                    do
OxfTri57.Attributed Title:
vita sancti philippi apostoli (34v); vita sancti
                        Iacobi minore (34v)

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
…I wolde þaim reste þair foly quod he if I
                    myghtffor al þat I þaim teche it soþe &
                    rightÞai clombe to hym in wrath & sithen ate lasteOf þe
                    pinnacle þai put hym doune & to þe erth hym
                    caste…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Sayne Philip & sayne Iacob with gude herte I ȝou
                    prayþurgh ȝou þat we may come til blis þat lasteȝ
                    ay
CULAdd3039.Note: Last 12 lines only, due to loss of folios.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein phelip and sein Iacob apostles were tweieÞe verste day
                    þat comeþ in may deþ hi þolede beie…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne sein Iacop & sein phelip
                    alsoÞat oure soule mote forþ wiþ here in þe ioie of
                    heuene be ido
CamCCC145.Note: Last 12 lines only, due to loss of folios.
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.164-7.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint phelip and Seint Iacob Apostles were tweyeÞe ffurste day
                    þat comeþ in May deþ hi þolede beye…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝerne Seint Iacob and Seint phelip
                    alsoÞat we mote fforþ wiþ ham in þe ioye of heuene beo
                    ydo

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint phelip & seint iacob appostelis were tweyÞe furst
                    day þat comeþ in may deþ hii þoled beye…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now bedde we ȝerne seint iacob & seint phelip al
                    soÞat oure saule mot forþ with here in þe Ioie of heuene be
                    do

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin phelip & sein Iacop apostles were tweyeþe verste day
                    þat comeþ in may deþ hy þolede beye…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne sein iacop & sein phelip
                    alsoþat oure soule mote forth wiþ hare in þe Ioie of heuene
                    be y do
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto philippo (f. 73v, by scribe in margin beside
                    first line); phillippo, De sancto Iacobo, Iacobo
                    (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint philip & seint Iacob apostel were tweieþe ferste dai þat comeþ in may þeþ hi þoleþe beie…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou bidde we ȝerne sein iacob & sein philip alsoþat oure soule mote fort wit hore in þe ioie of heuen be ido
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxxvi” added to left margin by later hand (f. 65v).

Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint phelip & seint Iacob apostles were tweneÞe furste day þat comeþ in may deþ heo þoleden beye…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now bidde we seint Iacob & seint phelip alsoÞat oure soules moten into heuene be do

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint philippe & Seint Iacob were apostlis tweieþe verste day þat comiþ in may deþ hij þolid beye…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we ȝerne Seint Iacob & Sein Phelip alsoÞat oure soule þorȝ hore veire bone to heuene mote so

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin Phelip and sein Iacob apostles were tweieÞe ferste day þat comeþ in may deþ hi þolede beie…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we ȝeorne sein Iacob and sein Phelip alsoþat oure soule mote forþ wiþ hare In þe ioie of heuene beo ido
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancto Phelipo (rubric in margin, f. 71v)

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Phelip & Seint Iacob apostles were tueyeþe furste dai þat comeþ in Mai deþ hi þolede beye…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we Seint Iacob & Seint phelip alsoþat oure soulen mote forþ wiþ here to þe ioye of heuene go

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Philip & Iacob were apostles twoþe first day
                    þat comes in Maij þai suffred deþ boþe…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…His soule þo he ded was to heuen on hegh con wendeNo god
                    for saynt Iacobes loue graunte vs þider to wende
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Philip and seint Iacob appostels were tweyÞe furst day
                    of May deþ þei suffred beye…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now prei we ȝerne seynt Philip & seint Iacob
                    alsoThat oure soules mote forth wiþ her to heuenly Ioye goo.
                    Amen.
